title: About Me
info: I'm from the beautiful island in the Caribbean Dominican Republic. I'm passionate about its culture and specially food! With not a lot of income, my parents got a PC when I was young. and I built my first game in GameMaker engine for Windows Xp when I was around 12 and I loved it! I love to develop usuful tools, manage projects and work hard until I get the job done.

title: SR2
info: Samir Emmanuel Rodriguez Rodriguez... Yes! 2 Rodriguez-es. So hence the SR(2) [ez-ar Squared].
info2: This is my dream Software Development company. For now, just free-lancing and getting experience everywhere I go.
